properties.name: email
properties.description: The email address of the contact

properties.name: listId
properties.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: The end user specified key of the user defined data. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The end user specified value of the user defined data

properties.name: tags
properties.description: The tags you want to set to the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: fields
properties.description: A comma-separated list of attributes to include in the response

properties.name: sortBy
properties.default: Defines the field in which search results are sort by. Note: It has to be using with the Direcction parameter

properties.name: updateFields
properties.description: The tags you want to add to the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: customFieldsUi
properties.description: The end user specified key of the user defined data. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: removeTags
properties.description: The tags you want to add to the contact. Choose from the list, or specify IDs using an expression.

properties.name: name
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: deprecated
properties.displayName: This service may no longer exist and will be removed from n8n in a future release.
